review: Great little box, just wish that it supported VUDU (without sideloading) and also I wish that Amazon would strike a deal with comcast/xfinity so that I could use the HBO GO app (I believe its the only cable provider that can't be used with the Amazon Fire TV and HBO GO).
author: M. Bond

review: This was better than I thought. Easy to use and the install was a breeze. Only thing I think they need to add is a sleep timer.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Awesome!this is anew awesome device. Works perfectly. Kids love the games and all the availble movie/tv shows and apps. Great built in parental controls. Free time works well on the fire tv also.

review: Great product and now my laptop and tablet are free for other work
author: mike pool

review: Is working out wonderfully for my 8 yr old. I wanted something that would be easy for her to find things to watch now that we got rid of cable. All she has to do is speak into the remote, and it will go to "Spongebob" or whatever she wants. The only downside is that it only seems to search for shows within Amazon's own app, and not on Hulu Plus and Netflix too. Otherwise, it works great.
author: STEVSH

review: Love it. One of the best purchases I've made. Also was able to cancel my cable tv service thanks to this.

review: Question, for Fire TV owners:Question, hope someone can answer:How is the Fire TV unit tethered to your computer? Is an HDMI cable connected from the unit to your computer? These instructions show how to install it from the Fire TV unit to the television but, not to the computer. Hope someone can help with this question. Thank you in advance. I am quite interested in this as a future purchase if my questions have been answered.
